mapper.select: SELECT result_code FROM result ORDER BY result_code desc LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO result(result_code, work_code, done_date, line_code, prod_code, order_amount, good_prod, faulty_prod, faulty_reason, remark) VALUES(CONCAT('RS', LPAD(#{result_code}, 4, '0')), #{work_code}, #{done_date}, #{line_code}, #{prod_code}, #{order_amount}, #{good_prod}, #{faulty_prod}, #{faulty_reason}, #{remark});
